@metadata.about: This file provides documentation for translation messages. Each message key has a description of its puprpose and parameters (if any).
@metadata.instructions: Copy this file to [[MediaWiki:Gadget-XFDcloser-messages.json]]. Keep the message keys the same, provide a translated message in place of the description.
@metadata.syntax: The syntax for specifying plurals, gender, grammer, etc. is per https://github.com/wikimedia/jquery.i18n#message-format

xfdcloser-example-sub-title: A short description of the application
xfdcloser-example-about: Short heading for the 'About this application' page
xfdcloser-example-footer: Text that goes in the footer
